author: Siobhán O'Grady
title: Amid international skepticism, China defends its official data after revising Wuhan death toll by 50 percent
description: The Chinese government insisted that there has not been a coverup.
content:
Zhao Lijian, a spokesman for the Chinese foreign ministry, insisted Friday that this revision in no way indicated a coverup and is based purely on standard efforts to take into account deaths that were previously miscounted or excluded.
But President Trump t… [+4237 chars]
